name: Double Agent Management
description: Techniques for handling and controlling double agents to feed misinformation or neutralize threats.

cards.title: Identifying and Vetting Double Agents
cards.description: Assessing the reliability and loyalty of an operative suspected of being a double agent.
bulletpoints: Implement controlled exposure tests to confirm loyalties
Monitor for unauthorized contacts with hostile intelligence agencies

cards.title: Feeding Misinformation to Double Agents
cards.description: Using controlled leaks and deceptive intelligence to mislead adversaries.
bulletpoints: Strategically release selective data to test information flow
Maintain plausible deniability for exposed operations
Use fabricated scenarios to divert adversarial resources
